content.detailedDescription: I went outside fir a smoke and a bright flash above my caught my eye.I watched that area of sky for around ten seconds, a smaller flash filled by another in exactly the same spot around twenty seconds later.Another 2 flashes at random intervals, followed by a gap of 20 seconds, then a short streak if burning light,red and gold. like something zapped off incredibly fast and left a light trail.
content.summary: A flashing light above me caught my eye, fairly bright, it then flashed three times with a gap if around 15 to 20 seconds between the flashes. it then zipped across a small area of sky leaving a reddish gold trail

content.detailedDescription: I observed along with others a brought object which was visible with a airliner in comparison it howered for 15 minutes and then took 10 minutes to slowly fade away . i am avid skywatcher and can differentiate between odd and normal
content.summary: Bright hovering sphere above 50000 ft for 20 min

content.detailedDescription:
A principios de enero 2015 envié unas fotos para usted mufon y eso fue de pesquisa ellos a mí. no llegamos a un acuerdo, los objetos eran indeterminado. bueno, en 31/01/2015 fotografiado este objeto lo que veo al las fotos. a diferencia de la última vez, esta vez yo y 3 testigos observaron más el objeto se mueva a gran altura y alta velocidad en frente de nosotros. el fenómeno transorreu en 1 minuto y 20 segundos hasta que desaparezca. tomé algunas fotografías del objeto 7 con la lente de zoom en la posición máxima de 300 mm. sólo los que tienen los árboles de coco son para dar la referencia de la distancia del objeto al suelo, y donde se fue. ¿crees que debo enviar estas fotos a mufon? creo que la página de allí muy difícil y lleva mucho tiempo en cargar. hice todas las fotos en raw (alta resolución). si usted me puede ayudar le doy las gracias.

att

aquilino
content.summary: Fotos of posible ovni

content.detailedDescription: I was on a trip to west virginia and we stopped in weston to show my friend the trans-allegheny lunatic asylum. as my friend i were driving around taking pictures i took this shot by chance. i didn't notice it until this morning when i blew up this picture to look at the building a little better. i don't know what it is. it could be dirt on my windshield because i shot through it but it kind of looks like it could be above the jet stream it is flying through. i just thought it was interesting and i thought i would share it with you. i would like to know what you think. i also think it could be military because we have jets and drones that are shaped like that.
content.summary: Saw it in my picture when i got home

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work.  not sure if i was working the midnight shift or afternoon shift because i can't remember what year it was.....Either 1983, 1984, or 1985.  i was about 24 at the time.  it was dark outside.  i lived in a mobile home park and as i was driving, i had to pass an apartment complex to my right.  this huge/massive ufo was hovering above the apartments and trees.  all i could see was the underside of it.  i just hung on to the steering wheel and kept staring at it in awe.  i wish i would have looked at it in more detail, but i was in shock.  it happened so fast and dissapeared so quickly.  i remember calling my mother and telling her about it, but i don't know why i didn't call the police station.  i've always wondered if anyone else had seen it and called on it.  it was so low and hovering right over the apartments, someone had to of seen something.  i've also always wondered if i had lost any time or not because i can't imagine calling my mother that late or early about it.  she just made fun of me and shrugged it off.  to this day, i've always told people what i had seen.  i believe in ufo's and find it very interesting.  i'd really like to one day get hypnotized to see if i could remember more about it.

i had to submit a date in order for this to be submitted, but i really can't remeber a month or exact year.
content.summary: I was around 24yrs. old at the time driving home from work.  either early am or late at night...Dark outside.  hovering above apartment complex.

content.detailedDescription:
It happened on may 25, 2011 at around 6:50 pm. one of my roommates and i were sitting out in the backyard talking while i was having a cig.

[our house was located on e 13th street between rosemont and swan. our backyard faced north over tucson towards the catalina foothills and mt. kimball.]

as i was sitting there, i noticed a black object coming over the mountains into the valley. it was flying south towards my area of town. my friend and i were still talking as i kept watching it get closer.

usually when i see a black object in the sky, my first expectation is it's a military stealth fighter or bomber. maybe a black helicopter. not many aircraft are the color this object was and just south of me was davis-monthan afb which it was making a beeline for. it's not often i get to see one of those planes, so i was hoping it was one of them. it was moving along at about the average speed i see most helicopters fly.

i couldn't identify it though. the object had no defined shape that i could make out at first. it was like a morphing shape-shifting blob of black. the black blob was roughly the size of a rice grain at arms length. it's altitude i would guess was between 500 - 1,000 feet. 

i was now curious as to what this thing was. i decided to run into the house for a pair of binoculars i own, bushnell 10x50s. i hurried back outside. the object was still in the sky, but further along its flight path now and closer to me. i used my binoculars to zoom in on the object. when i located it, i was at a lost to explain or even begin to understand what i was seeing.

it was a cluster of 6-7 hexagonal shaped saucers all of which were charcoal-black in color. much like the stealth color. they were spinning on their axis, making a full rotation every few seconds. as well, they were all rotating at about the same speed around this intense purple light at the center of this cluster. the purple was light, almost pink, as opposed to being a dark shade like violet. the light didn't appear to emanate from any solid object, yet it seemed to be responsible for holding this cluster together.

i was shocked, impressed and a little scared. i've seen all kinds of sci-fi alien movies with saucers and ufos. i have never seen anything even remotely close to what this looked like. i couldn't imagine what such a thing would be used for. it was really bizarre!

the black saucers were rotating around this purple light much like satellites do around earth. of each saucer, one hexagon face always pointed at the light and the other away from it. like the moon does as it revolves around us. all the while, none of them were colliding into each other despite all of them rotating in every which way.

i couldn't see anything that resembled a cockpit. i didn't get the impression that this thing was manned. simply from the way it flew, i don't see how a pilot would be feasible. 

the entire time, i'm describing what i'm seeing to my roommate. i asked him to take a look at it through the binoculars, but he declined. he had showed no interest in seeing it or hearing about it.

i had my smart phone on me and decided to take a picture of it before it was gone. it doesn't take very good images so i didn't mess with it upon first realizing this is a ufo. my phone was an lg optimus s. the camera is 3.2 megapixel. my zoom was set at 4 mm.

i only took one picture of it, more or less to have a date and time stamp of the sighting and show the black spot at least. it was taken at 6:53 pm and shows the eastern sky from the backyard. the ufo was passing over e broadway blvd at this point somewhere between craycroft and wilmot rd. it was still heading towards dmafb. from me, the ufo was about 2 miles away at it's closest. i never heard any sound. most jets i would hear this close.

i continued watching it through my binoculars. i moved to the front yard when the ufo became impossible to see because of the roof blocking my line of sight. i eventually lost visual of it to the south of me. it was around e 22nd st by then. i presume it had to be flying into military airspace at some point.
content.summary: Witnessed a cluster of black hexagonal saucers orbiting around a purple light.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cousins house in sefner florida we were having a party.I don't recall who actually spotted it first: but a small light began growing larger. then it stopped at about half the size of a noontime sun in the sky. it was a red orange color. then a dark spot in the center appeared and came toward us. it grew larger and more clear as it came closer. it was smaller then the space shuttle; but similar shape. it had strange markings like shapes triangles and circles mostly. it flew very slowly overhead i remember thinking that i could have thrown a rock and hit it. everyone seemed to be frozen as if we were unable to move. but never took her eyes off of the object.We watched it go over slowly then disappear in the easterly direction after it disappeared we turned to look at the fireball and it had vanished.The weirdest part is that no one who witnessed it will admit to it not even to me. they all ignore what they saw! this is not the first time i have seen a fireball. i have seen a fireball on two other occasions.The first time was with a farmer i worked for when i was 16. the next time was a few years before the one i just described in the beginning.But this was the first time i ever saw anything come out of the fireball.When we went back inside the house we were all amazed at how long we had been out there.Several people asked that were not outside where we had been; but none of us had a response.Since this time i have had an odd feeling that i will not only see it again but everyone will witness it.The object that came out of the fireball made no sound and the fireball itself made no sound either. i had heard that other people had witnessed a similar account of the fireball but i have not heard about anyone seeing the object that came out of it.I have given this a lot of thought over the years and often thought perhaps the object was something made by our military because of the shape of the ship that came out of the fireball. i do not know for sure what it was but i don't believe it is from this world.I would like to have met the beings inside; but that did not happen at least not to my memory. the strangest thing is no one thought to take a picture and no one spoke or even maybe sound as the object went past us.I hope to be contacted by mufon so they can shed some light on what i observed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several of my friends and i saw a fireball hovering over dover and something came out of it and flew overhead. time stopped  had  other sightings also

content.detailedDescription:
I got up this morning.  i was getting ready for work.  i got in my truck  and decided to take a 
picture of sunrise  i took the first pictures going down hill from my house. then when i got to the main road i took 3 more pictures    the second picture when i was on road.  i stop my pick to take the picture   the other two pictures  one minute later when i atopes at the traffic light    the sun was on my left    i noticed the orb. after i took the picture and i posted on facebook  then i noticed the the blue- green orb  that was on the right then  it looks like i was moving to left  getting away
content.summary: I took 4 pictures of sunrises in differents locations in my way to work and the object  was on the right and it was moving  to the left

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from grocery shopping, driving north on i-79 in marion county, wv. at 9:35, passing small regional airport, saw a large formation of lights moving very slowly from nw side to east. formation was approximately 500 feet or less from ground, moving approximately 20-30mph. it passed directly over my vehicle as i slowed; i pulled onto the exit ramp, stopped on the berm, got out to observe further and it was gone.
the entire event lasted less than a minute, closer to thirty seconds.

the formation was like a 300 foot string of 6 lights with a set of 4 in the center like a square, traveling along it's long axis. no wing lights were visible.
i travel past this airport daily and nightly, and am familiar with the small craft it can handle. i am also familiar with the military aircraft we have occasionally. this was totally unfamiliar, not a transport, not a c-130, not an osprey. 


      >>      .  .  . :: .  .  .      >> (arrows are direction of travel)
content.summary: 9:35ish pm at i-79 marker 135, large, long 4 light rectangle, 3 out to front and back

content.detailedDescription: The extensive chemtrails were observed over monterey bay from the westcliff drive just after sunrise. multiple planes were making the trails. then an unusual stationary light was observed on the edge of chemtrail, but by the time i got my camera in position the light would disappear, or fade out i saw it about 5 times over a period of 10 minutes or so. it appeared in different area's above the bay and always looked stationary.I was able to get 2 photo's.
content.summary: Appeared stationary then disapeared then reappeared in another spot next to chemtrails

content.detailedDescription: I've sent this in once before and never had a response. if i did i never recieved it. this picture was taken on 8/26/2013 in lost river ,w.V. my father and i were on vaction and he was taking pictures off the deck of our cabin. he was panning right to left and one of the shots showed what looks like a disk with 3 other , what look like helicopters, following it. we never saw this untill we got home a few days later. would love to hear from anyone and can provide the card we downloaded from.,thanks.
content.summary: Another try to have someone look at my lost river ,west virginia picture.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been attacked in my own bed almost on a daily basis since christmas eve (removed a large portion of my upper lip on christmas eve).  they have inflicted great pain and stress, removed my skin, left hard objects beneath my skin, bruises on top and below my skin, red needle marks and red lines all over my body.

they left behind:

1.  white matter in several spots on a pair of my pants next to my bed

 2.  one morning after receiving a large white water looking bubble on my chin with a large red dot in the middle with pain from my chin up to my ear,  i blew my nose and black particles and a white sparkly substance came out and (see #3).

3.  also, they left a skin color substance in my bathroom sink.  it was several layers with holes and was almost weightless.  i accidentally washed it down the sink.

i have no recollection of these attacks.  two nights ago, i saw three beings flying very fast toward my face in front of me but disappeared before they reached me.  i was terrified.
content.summary: Been injured while sleeping many times a week since christmas eve.  they are inflicting great pain and removing my skin, left white substance on my pants & blew out of my nose black particles & sparkly white foreign sub., left skin colored matter

content.detailedDescription:
Hello. i live in tempe, arizona, a city in the phoenix metroplex area. i am a graphic designer who has lived in the area for 5 years. my mother was also present for this event. my parents are both licensed pilots and i personally have spent hundreds of hours flying with them in various aircraft throughout my life. although i am no expert, i feel confident in what i saw and believe that i witnessed something very unusual. along with this report, i submitted a report to nuforc, contacted media, and made graphics of what i saw using my abilities as a graphic designer.

this event occurred during the superbowl here in the phoenix area on february 1st, 2015, at 7:40 pm. i was cleaning up my house and was taking some trash out to the backyard. on my way over to the trash can, i looked up at the moon which, at the time, was in the upper eastern part of the sky. it was at this moment that i saw a curious-looking craft heading north some degrees above of the moon. relative to the full moon, it was just slightly smaller than the moon. this object stood out to me immediately because it was not following the flight path which all planes follow on their approach into nearby sky harbor intl. airport. planes flying into sky harbor at night typically fly in east to west as our runways run in this orientation. if a plane is flying over this airspace, its altitude is typically very high as to not disturb the lower traffic. this craft’s altitude appeared to be relatively low, around 7,000-10,000 feet or so and well within a mile from me to the east, making it unusual from the start.

as i observed this craft going north-bound, i tried to logically make out what it was. it had one unblinking white-slightly yellow light on the bottom of it. this light appeared to illuminate areas of the actual structure of the craft, which had a reddish-orangish tint to it and what appeared to be faint horizontal lines going across. the areas of the craft that weren't illuminated were dark but slightly lighter than the sky. this gave me a general sense of the shape and outline of the craft, which seemed triangular. the outline was not clearly defined. it seemed fuzzy somehow. it also seemed to shift and change shape slightly but i am not sure if this was due to my mind's perception trying to fit it into a known object, such as a plane.

i stared at this object, transfixed, and as stated above tried to logically perceive it as a plane, thinking that the illuminated areas were perhaps the tail section and/or wings of a southwest jet, which are commonly painted with orangish colors. however, this object just didn’t fit the description of a jet. there were no navigation lights, it made no sound, and the shape that i could make out seemed to be triangular in shape. the illuminated areas seemed to perhaps be the two back points of this triangle.

once i ruled it out as an aircraft, i thought that perhaps i was viewing a very large satellite and that the illuminated areas were solar panels. many images that i have seen of satellites show their solar panels to be of a rusty-orangish color, similar to what i was seeing. this, too, just did not fit. at this moment, i noticed that the object was beginning to turn. it made a smooth 90 degree turn in a sharp arc going from north to west in seconds. as it was turning, my view of it changed. before it turned, i had been looking up at it, seeing it from the bottom. now as it was turning (and north of me at that point) i was seeing it from the side. it was at this view that i could see two lights. i am not sure if this was actually an additional light on the craft, or if it was part of the same light i saw on the bottom. perhaps because of the new view point, i was seeing the bottom and top of this light, split horizontally by the craft itself. it was at this point that i noticed how fast this thing was going and how fast it had made the turn. it seemed to accelerate towards the end of this turn. i remember thinking at that moment that a commercial jet would've been torn apart if it made a turn like that at that speed.

as this thought was occurring to me, i heard the thunderous sound of jet engines from behind. as soon as i looked above me, two military jets flew almost directly overhead. they each had one sole blinking white strobe light, very bright, and no other navigation lights that i could see. i remember thinking that these aircraft (and their single blinking strobe) looked kind of ominous to me. they were around the same altitude as the mysterious craft, and i questioned if this was an escort of some sort. it was clearly not an escort, as the jets were about 15 seconds behind the craft when they came into my view and were flying aggressively. when they came into view they were heading north-northwest- again, very unusual for this area as this is sky harbor's airspace. they also turned west in pursuit of the object, and despite their tremendous flying capabilities, could not make nearly as sharp a turn to the west. their turn was much wider as illustrated in the map graphic i made.

i've seen strange things in the sky before, but never with military jets following it. as soon as i saw military jets literally chasing this thing, i became extremely astonished, excitable and somewhat frantic. i called out to my mother, who came outside to witness the aerial pursuit as all three flew west, coincidentally directly towards the glendale stadium where the superbowl was simultaneously taking place. she, too, witnessed the two military jets and the object. the object at this time appeared as an unwavering light and she did not see the structural details that i witnessed when it had flown overhead. 

we watched the object and the jets fly ever westward and the jet noise increased at this time, perhaps due to the jets afterburners. we watched all three crafts until they were out of view. it appeared that they flew slightly south, and then west once more beyond the horizon. the entire sighting lasted under 2 minutes. it may sound strange, but the next day i remember having a feeling that the object was saying hi.

i want to note that because of the superbowl, two blackhawk helicopters and two military jets were flying around the valley that week for security reasons during the superbowl. i myself, along with the rest of phoenix, were aware of their presence and purpose that week because of local media reports providing citizens awareness in case we saw them flying around that week. i had seen and become quite familiar with these military aircraft all week. the jets that i saw pursuing this object were not the two patrol jets doing security for the superbowl. soon after the sighting, i saw the two patrol jets flying in from the north going south near sky harbor at a slightly higher altitude. at the time, the jets and object could actually still be seen (barely) far out west of my location. my mom and i both had the feeling that the jets we had seen had possibly been scrambled for the expressed purpose of intercepting this object.

thank you so much for your time in reading my very long description. i wanted to be as thorough as possible. i very much appreciate that there are places where these kind of things can be reported. please feel free to contact me for any further information. i would love to know if there is radar data or tower communication from that night.. once again, sincere thanks!
content.summary: Strange triangular object flying north made 90 degree turn west over sky harbor intl. airport and was pursued by two military jets.

content.detailedDescription:
That is on august 21, 2011 at gampaha. after getting my dinner at my house i went to the kitchen to wash my hands (our kitchen is separated by the house). as a habit when i go to the kitchen i looked at sky. on that day i saw that ufo at about 8.00 pm in south sky. when i look at the sky i saw a one star like thing blinking very rapidly. i suddenly stopped and watched that object to know what it was. i noticed it was moving here and there. some times it glows very brightly. at that time i saw that object illuminating with blue, red, and white colors in a rapidly changing manner. i shouted to the others of our house to come and see this object. and all my family members saw this object. they also excited by watching this. i quickly went to the house and got my digital camera. and i got lots of photos. but only few of photos captured the object. after that i ran to the in front of the house and got another photos. there also few photos captured the object. we saw that this object always move up and down and right and left in a random manner.
            i think that object is at a very high level from the ground because when mists like clouds are coming towards that, the object was disappeared for a short time. after clouds passed away that was reappeared. 
            this object appeared for about 45 minutes. at 8.45 pm lots of clouds came and start a rain. at that time we went by our vehicle to a field which we believed that object could be appeared. but nothing we saw. then we came to our home and after the rain stopped i went in front of the house and looked at the sky at about 10.00 pm but nothing there.
           on that day i plugged the camera to my laptop and analyzed them. when i saw those photos i really disappointed. but when i zoomed those photos i saw a red colored spot like object appeared on that photo. i analyzed another photo and when it zoomed i saw white colored spot like object and also that zoomed image is very different from the other zoomed images because there has four black dots around that white colored spot. after that day i analyzed other photos also and i saw blue colored spot like object.
content.summary: Ufo over south sky in gampaha. changing red,blue,white lights

content.detailedDescription: Like before i drove into a town with ten fifteen ufos flying around like they looking for something i got closer they piping up in my car seamed like esp or something asking where i'm going what i'm doing.. decided to head back to albuquerque never drove that far again from town seen some other stuff happening around here too been visited by a couple beings too one looked like a hammer head shark or one like a big headed girl one rainbow face they came together one night my whole body starting with head got swole out by a triangle headed one with a rectangle girl one size of 36 inches plus they say they devil and wife...Man a lot a lot around here now seams like i'm tried and out of brain power..Oh plus in the military i was abducted few times till they retire me out on schophrina ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Headed east for nice night trip near santa rosa saw ten fifteen lights a few odd heads pipes inside car like looking around then car muffler messed up this place seamed crazy cars dissapeared in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the object in the sky as i was driving to food lion and inwood west virginia at that time to me i thought it might have been a plane but then i looked at my brother that was with me and said oh my gosh why is a plane to love that's a big plane to be flying that low by the time i made it to the food lion in inwood we had been noticed that it was actually a triangle shaped and had four lights all together but on the edge of what i believe is the front of the object had a huge strip of bright white light the other lights there was one red light that seem to have blinked and the other ones just kind of stayed on. it barely made a sound it made a humming sound but for an object that big you would think it would be really loud! it was flying low in a circle pattern around and around in the same circle and it was there for at least 35 minutes and then it was just gone
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: T was a solid looking triangle it barley made a sound and it was really big. went slow and fast and kept hovering and flying in the same circle low to ground and around a big population!

content.detailedDescription:
My mom, [name removed/cms/dr], and i were driving north on i-5 to castle rock from a delivery in woodland.  it was about 7pm and we were about two miles from passing through kalama when i noticed a really bright "star" on the horizon to the east, only far too low to be a star with such intense lighting. we always have our eyes to the sky and have seen our fair share of unidentified objects in the sky.  quite often in this area, actually.  well, we both seen it as it was stationary and did not move the whole time we observed it.  about a mile down the road i pulled off at the todd road exit and pulled over and parked on the on-ramp before entering the freeway again.  we sat there watching it for about 15 minutes and it would emit different colors of lighting, not beam like, but like the glow of a star.  while we were sitting there observing this object, i started to take pictures of it with a samsung galaxy s5 active smart phone.  i took 4 or 5 pictures and then the camera started to malfunction with a majority of the screen being black, about 2/3 of the screen, then only a couple seconds later the whole screen turned black and the phone froze.  we sat there for a few more minutes and about 3 minutes since the phone froze, it started working normally again, but we did not shoot anymore pictures.  a couple minutes after the phone coming back on the object was still stationary, just as it was the entire time of observation, so we decided to hit the road.  when we got home i saved the pictures to my computer and opened within basic photoviewer that comes with windows 7.  i blew the images up and these two things are what i see.  i could not see 2 objects while physically observing it from the freeway, but they did show up in these pictures.  i was amazed to say the least.  
 i added another 2 pictures of a different object observed 2 days prior from here at home, [address removed/cms/dr]
one is inverted and the other is the original photo.  i'm not 100% but i think it was around 10pm our time.  this is similar to the above as far as i thought it was just a star looking object, only an out of place star, until i got it on computer.
content.summary: Driving n on i-5 we seen what looked like an out of place, super bright, star so we stopped along the freeway to observe.

content.detailedDescription: i looked up in sky while the dog was going potty in my side yard  and i am like wait a minute that's not a plane it's too high to be plane it went behind the moon kept flying and you could see its lights they were so pretty and it was going pretty fast but sideways and i notice its pretty red and white lights and i remember it going behind the moon then disappears it was leaving like this trail behind it . and i have seen ufo's before when i lived in texas so i was like here's other  sighting that i got to see after all these years it was just my texas sighting as kid it had same white and red lights on it under neither.
content.summary: Ufo that went behind the moon

content.detailedDescription:
After leaving a restaurant, my wife and i observed two red lights, moving very slowly, always in perfect formation with each other.

the lights seemed to be of a compound nature, (multiple small illumination sources) and as the object rotated, the lights faded away as if they were facing forward and the mass of the object blocked the lights from my view.  there was total silence during the observation which was witnessed by myself, my wife, and an additional man.

as i'm a pilot and a pretty good observer of arial phenomenon, i can't explain this by any form of aircraft that i am familiar with

the objects course was roughly 30 degrees for a time, then it hovered for about 30 seconds, and then proceeded on a course of near due north which would place it moving towards march rafb.

there is a lot of air traffic into and out of march, including c-17s and kc-135s but this was not one of them.  as an air force veteran, i know these aircraft.

there was no flashing beacon, and the lights i saw were not navigation lights as one of them would be green if that were so.  of course, total silence also discounted any kind of powered aircraft.

as far as size goes, i was unable to anything but the lights and i have no way of estimating  their distance but the impression i got was that it was very big and not too far away.  the two lights covered an area about equally to my fist held at arms length.

i tried to observe stars falling behind the craft thus providing a clue to the objects size and shape, but as i was in a parking lot which was well lit and most stars were washed out.

i hope this proves helpful.  it's my first ufo during my 63 years on this planet.

good hunting,

jeff
content.summary: Two red lights, moving very slowly, always in perfect formation with each other.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 11 2005 i was the captain of a regular freighter boeing a/c from sydney australia to auckland new zealand when at approx. 0230 in the morning whilst cruising at 33,000 feet the entire crew observed an extremely bright light to the se of our flight path which was east. the bright light was at a considerable distance from us and at a higher elevation estimated to be above 100,000 feet when first observed.
whilst observing this bright light 2 other objects joined the main body from each side and positioned themselves underneath the main object and apart.
after several minutes they all started to move in unison but maintaining their station up and away at a rapid pace such that they disappeared in approximately 30 seconds with the smaller not so bright objects disappearing first.
it was estimated that when the largest and brightest object disappeared that it had to be hundreds of miles away and several hundreds of thousands of feet in elevation on it's se path.
the crew had a combined experience of in excess of 35,000 hrs so had a pretty good appreciation of elevations and distance.
content.summary: 3 lights observed for 3 to 4 minutes at altitude estimated to be above 100,000 feet

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures from my front yard and street, facing n. e. ( some picture's were taken from street and some from porch about every 5 min's.Of the (blood) moon and started noticing a difference to the right of the moon. fuzzy looking lites in rolls mostly white then mixed with color's, a half dome on the top with a small lite in the middle, there were three other colored lites off from the bottom i took more and all of a sudden all i saw was exhaust tracks in front of the moon. when i downloaded the photo's i was shocked at what i caught on tape. in the middle of my pictures to the right side of the moon, was the unusual light's in a pattern , about 4/5 stories tall, i really can't tell how wide, the  dome was about middle of craft. but the lights looked to me like windows or ports all in a roll! i knew what i had seen since there were no other object's in the ski with  the other picture's. all of a sudden in between flashes it was there and gone just as fast. my emotion's are honored to have seen what ever this was. i would like for you to examine the photo's and you tell me what i saw.

thank you
content.summary: I was taking photos of the blood moon and suddenly different lites in a pattern appired

content.detailedDescription: Received a text message asking if i had seen the ufo's over the city, went outside with binoculars and i was able to locate 3 sets of lights, they seemed to circle each other occasionally hovering in place with the lights shifting from white to yellow to orange then red. initially the lights looked like they could be from a plane but then did not follow color or flight patterns from airplanes. i called another friend about a mile away who also watched the lights with me for about 30 minutes. during that time a fourth set of lights appeared. eventually the lights just dissipated.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Series of for sets of lights, changing color and intensity circling around the city

content.detailedDescription: I got off work at about 2:50pm pacific time drove home. it was windy but sunny and there were some clouds high in the sky. as i got home i get out of my car and look up. i see something floating and i know it's not an airplane so i scramble to get my phone out.(13 megapixels) i start recording the purple object floating over my neighbors house at about 400 feet up. in the video you can hear me saying "what the f*** is that thing?!?. i heard crows in the background. it looked like a purple r2d2 from star wars. it flew over the trees and stayed stable which lead me to conclude that it was not any type of balloon.Once it flew over the tree going towards san jose cupertino area i jumped in my car to try and follow it. i saw it fly over towards de anza college and then i stopped because it was going to fast for me to follow. keep in mind i live close to multiple airports so i know what military planes and civilian planes look like. this was none of the above. i have never seen any thing like it. i'm hoping you guys can analyze my galaxy s5 video and see what it is.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It looked like a purple man floating through the air.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At first the white flashing lights appear as a big stream as one unit than maneuver in all directions .. the yellow orange lights are off to the left and fade
content.summary: Multiple flashing white lights with yellow orange lights seen to the left fade in the clouds as the f

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a couple of shots of the huge moon and when i looked at the pics there were these light orbs. they are not refracted light and in the second shot they have moved away in a path. i took the photos myself only seconds apart and in the short amount of time the crafts moved a pretty good distance. they are not water droplets because i took the photos with my iphone 6 plus that was not wet or anything.They are not planets or starts of headlights these craft are invisible to the naked eye and can only be caught with a camera lenses.I am baffled as to what they are and why are they here?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was taking a couple of shots of the huge moon and when i looked at the pics there were these light orbs. they are not refracted light and in the second shot they have moved away in a path.

content.detailedDescription: was watching a plain traveling eat to wast i'd was a c 130 as it passed over head i saw at light dec. from the sky at first site it came from more than 800 thousand feet.To about 30 thousands.  the moved slowly ne in travle about 20 miles then just vanished. it was the brightest light i have seen in years. and the bright s light in the sky. at first i thought it was a satellite but they don't drop altitude and i have seen lots of them and the time was wrong for one to fly over. i know it was not a plain there was no sound at all. it was about 5 to 10 miles from me to the south.The closest it came was about 3 miles.It did not blink flash just a vary bright light. then it just vanished. never seen a light like it and to come out of the sky from that altitude.  was strang. and that's it.I was on the phone and forgot to take pictures sorry.
content.summary: Extremely bright light looked like a ball vary large .

content.detailedDescription: The date was 10/04/2012 it was about five o'clock in the afternoon when i noticed a round object moving on my right (ne) and appeared to be moving slowly to the n nw. i took out my jazz mov178 hd camcorder and began filming the object. i filmed it for just under three minutes.The object at first looked like a balloon that might have been released but the wind was blowing to the south and a balloon would not have been able to move in the direction it was moving. the object was rolling and appeared to give of a corona like pulsation of orange yellow energy. it also began to appear to change its size and shape but displayed no extreme flight characteristics until near the end of the clip when the object traveled back along its own flight path for several seconds before making a second 180 degree course change to put it back on its original course. at this point it was difficult to distinguish the object with the small display on my camcorder. it appeared it remained on its course towards the nw though it was no longer visible.I have filmed other strange phenomena and have submitted another report with video to mufon in the past so i was not overly exited by what i saw, the greatest emotion i felt was curiosity.
content.summary: Walked out of building and noticed a strange  object to the ne moving slowly to the nw

content.detailedDescription: I was the first officer on a commercial airline flight from chicago o'hare (kord) to northwest arkansas (kxna). we were a crj-700 aircraft flying under the call sign envoy 3229. we were approximately 75nm to the southwest of farmington, missouri on a direct course from the st. louis vor to the spoke intersection (exact latitude and longitude of spoke is 36-55-01.020n 093-16-57.170w) at flight level 340 on a rough heading of 240 degrees. at altitude, it was a crystal clear night with an overcast layer of clouds more the 10,000 feet below that was blocking most of the ground light. both i and the captain were observing the night sky when we noticed an object that appeared to be a stationary star at our 11 o'clock position make a quick high speed acceleration on what would appear to be a 200 heading disappearing into the black of night in seconds. the object was way above our current altitude, i'd estimate it to be well above the 80,000 foot range. within minutes, another "star like" object at our 1 o'clock position also appearing to be stationary, made a course correction to an estimated 200 heading, again accelerating rapidly into the darkness and disappeared just like the first object, roughly the same course as well. the sighting happened around 1950 central time or 0150z. i brought this sighting to the attention of air traffic control at 1954 central 0154z. we were talking to kansas city on frequency 128.35. i asked the controller how high his radar saw and if he had seen anything unusual. he responded that they had not and i then gave him the description that i have explained above. the controller proceeded to ask standard questions of headings and altitudes of the object and then proceeded to tell us that we were not the first aircraft to report a sighting like that in that sector and it has been a reoccurring event. within a few minutes, another aircraft responded to having seen the same star light objects. that airplane was operating under the call sign webber. since the event, i have heard no more information on the sighting, nor have seen another one like it.
content.summary: Two lights appeared as stars, departed rapidly from the sky. observed on commercail airline flight
